content: wild at heart is a one-skein asymmetrical triangular shawl knitted in fingering-weight yarn with a very simple garter and eyelet pattern perfect for showing off your wildest skein you know you have that one skein in your stash that is so crazy you don t know what to do with it show off your wild side with wild at heart i designed wild at heart to be a very quick and easy pattern with a simple eyelet stitch that will not get lost if you choose a crazy variegated yarn experienced knitters should find it exceedingly easy to knit this little shawl it could also be a great first asymmetrical triangular shawl for ambitious beginners pattern includes a chart for the eyelet section as well as written instructions stripe version is available here wild at heart stripe 1 *pattern has been reworded for clarity and updated as of feb 1 2023 * **needles and notions ** us size 6 4 0 mm or size to obtain gauge 24 32 in/60 81 cm circular needle recommended the pattern is written to maximize your yardage a small kitchen scale to weigh yarn would be handy **yarn & yardage ** 400 yd/366 m or more fingering weight merino or blend sample used spun right round sw sock 80% sw merino 20% nylon 400 yd/366 m/100 g 1 skein parakeet feet colorway **gauge ** in garter stitch 20 sts and 42 row per 4 in/10 cm unblocked 18 sts and 36 row per 4 in/10 cm blocked exact gauge not crucial but a large discrepancy in gauge especially row gauge will affect yarn usage **final measurements ** measurements will vary depending on your gauge and yardage used but the sample pictured measures 76 in/193 cm wingspan 14 in/35 5 cm depth measurements taken after blocking *pattern has been test knitted and tech edited * thank you and happy knitting *if you received a hard copy of this pattern at vogue knitting live please note there is an error in eyelet row b it should read as follows row b ws k1 ssk **p** until 2 sts remain kfb k1 just change that k to a p and you are all set or just download the latest version here i apologize for any inconvenience * 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wild-at-heart-stripe
